scripts.build: astro build && cd server && npm run build
scripts.build:cloudflare: astro build && cd server && npm run build:cloudflare
scripts.build:node: astro build && cd server && npm run build:node
scripts.db:seed:local: wrangler d1 execute astro_marketplace --local --file migrations/0002_seed.sql && wrangler d1 execute astro_marketplace --local --file migrations/0003_seed_admin.sql
scripts.db:console:local: wrangler d1 execute astro_marketplace --local --command "SELECT name FROM sqlite_schema WHERE type='table' ORDER BY name;"
